description:
Default password of '' effectively disables the VNC service on ESXi because VNC (as implemented on ESXi) will not allow blank passwords. Set the default to something sensible like "vmware" or "openstack" and document that to the user.

* https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/virt/vmwareapi/vmops.py#L219
title: VNC default password for vmwareapi is bad
